sent.orig: He disclosed that he had submitted his resignation.
The demonstrators were baying for the resignation of the prime minister.
sent.trans: 游行示威者大声疾呼，要求首相辞职。

sent.orig: We do not want any citizens full of heroic resignation in these hills.
sent.trans: 在这一带山区，我们不需要任何英雄般的克己的公民。

sent.orig: The vice president of marketing has handed in his letter of resignation.
sent.trans: 负责营销的副总经理已经递交了辞呈。
